quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
author: Epictetus

quote: The more we value things outside our control, the less control we have.
author: Epictetus

quote: Man conquers the world by conquering himself.
author: Zeno of Citium

quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
author: Seneca

quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not.
author: Epicurus

quote: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
author: Seneca

quote: Any day Invest in friendships, you'll never regret making a friend but you'll always regret that ex  for whom you isolated and avoided friends.
author: Rohit Manal

quote: No power can maintain itself if only hypocrites represent it.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: It may be satisfactory, but that's another word for mediocrity.
author: David Goggins

quote: Intellect is nothing without energy. Ideas are nothing without energy. High-energy people win
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The man who goes to the gym every single day regardless of how he feels will always beat the man who goes to the gym when he feels like going to the gym.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Do the impossible and you wil never doubt yourself ever again.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
author: Rumi

quote: Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees.
author: Rumi

quote: Sometimes people don't want to hear the truth because they don't want their illusions destroyed.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Pain unlocks a secret doorway in the mind, one that leads to both peak performance and beautiful silence
author: David Goggins
